title: Information required
fullText:
The minimum amount of information required for design isâ€”
(a)	design load energy (daily energy consumption);
(b)	maximum a.c. and d.c. demand; and
(c)	surge demand.
Where the daily design load energy equals or exceeds 1 kWh/d, seasonal variation of average daily energy demand is also required.
This information is to be drawn from a list of all electrical loads detailing supply type (a.c. or d.c.), real and apparent power consumption, usage time and surge demand.
NOTE: A worked example is provided in Appendix A and blank worksheets are provided in Appendix B.
